nodes.excerpt: Pika (pronounced pi·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
nodes.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Pika（发音为pi-kuh，像picker）是一款简单易用、开源的macOS原生色彩采集器。Pika让你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的颜色变得很简单，所以你可以继续成为一个快速、成功的设计师。
localize.tagline: 一款适用于macOS的开源颜色挑选器应用。

localize.description: Pika（發音爲pi-kuh，像picker）是一款簡單易用、開源的macOS原生色彩採集器。Pika讓你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的顏色變得很簡單，所以你可以繼續成爲一個快速、成功的設計師。
localize.tagline: 一款適用於macOS的開源顏色挑選器應用。

nodes.excerpt: Join us for weekly fireside chats with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta, former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook

nodes.excerpt: The most powerful product analytics tool on the market, with up to 10x the data limits of other free plans. Plus, early-stage startups get a year of Mixpanel's Growth plan for free. ✔️ 100K monthly tracked users ✔️ All core reports ✔️ Unlimited data history

nodes.author: Laura Krieger

localize.description: 市场上最强大的产品分析工具，数据限制是其他免费计划的10倍。另外，早期创业公司可免费获得一年的Mixpanel成长计划。✔️每月跟踪10万用户 ✔️所有核心报表 ✔️无限数据历史记录。

nodes.excerpt: Penpot is a free & open source design tool Create beautiful user interfaces in collaboration with your cross-domain teams. Components, low-code, libraries and design systems support! Native SVG! Share, present and test your designs, all in one place.

nodes.excerpt: Use multiple camera devices to capture and create astonishing life moments with SYYNCC. Whether you’re into extreme sports, or parties, now you and your friends can use your imagination and turn the craziest video ideas into life.

localize.description: 使用多种摄像设备，用SYYNCC捕捉和创造令人惊叹的生活瞬间。无论你是喜欢极限运动，还是喜欢派对，现在你和你的朋友都可以发挥你的想象力，将最疯狂的视频创意变成生活。
localize.tagline: 多镜头视频拼贴，共同创建和分享视频。

nodes.excerpt: Been working on an icon set off and on over the last year, and I am finally releasing V1 today! What You'll Get: • Sketch File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights • Figma File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights

nodes.excerpt: Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app instantly with no-code plugins built by Pathfix. Pathfix plugins handle the entire OAuth process and gives you instant access to provider Actions, without API or endpoint complexity.

localize.tagline: 将OAuth集成到你的Bubble.io应用中，即刻就能实现。

nodes.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。
localize.tagline: 零售空間作爲一種服務，按小時計算，有視頻牆!

nodes.excerpt: Instantly create a mockup for any website. Paste the page URL and instantly generate a wireframe image of the site or your favorite websites in full-page resolution (3000 x 2000 pixels) with the background color of your choice.

nodes.author: Hammad Bhatti

localize.description: 了解您的用户行为，提高您的转化率，查看热点以获得更好的行动号投放，查看用户的光标轨迹以了解您的网站销售流程。给您的客户提供他们可以理解的分析，而无需学习曲线。
localize.tagline: 分析变得简单

localize.description: 瞭解您的用戶行爲，提高您的轉化率，查看熱點以獲得更好的行動號投放，查看用戶的光標軌跡以瞭解您的網站銷售流程。給您的客戶提供他們可以理解的分析，而無需學習曲線。
localize.tagline: 分析變得簡單

nodes.excerpt: Version data, track models, train on custom clusters - without worrying about setting up infrastructure or cloud compute. Save on cloud costs by only paying for what you need. Run hyperparameter sweeps on multiple nodes with the click of a button.
nodes.title: latch.ai - Train, track and serve machine learning on the cloud.
nodes.author: Kenny Workman

localize.description: 版本数据、跟踪模型、在自定义集群上进行训练--无需担心设置基础设施或云计算。只需为您需要的东西付费，即可节省云计算成本。只需点击一个按钮，即可在多个节点上运行超参数扫描。
localize.tagline: 在云上训练、跟踪和服务机器学习。

localize.description: 版本數據、跟蹤模型、在自定義集羣上進行訓練--無需擔心設置基礎設施或雲計算。只需爲您需要的東西付費，即可節省雲計算成本。只需點擊一個按鈕，即可在多個節點上運行超參數掃描。
localize.tagline: 在雲上訓練、跟蹤和服務機器學習。

nodes.excerpt: Create awesome effects like skeuomorph, neon, glitch, glass, and more - right in Figma! One-click transforms, adjust properties with ease, mix & match. Go creative! Available for free in the Figma community.
nodes.title: Morph Plugin for Figma - Create awesome effects right in Figma
nodes.author: milan maheshwari

localize.description: 在Figma中创建超棒的效果，如Skeuomorph、霓虹灯、闪光、玻璃等--就在Figma中！一键变换，轻松调整属性，混合匹配。一键转换，轻松调整属性，混合和匹配。发挥创意吧 可在 Figma 社区免费使用。
localize.tagline: 在Figma中直接创建超棒的效果

localize.description: 在Figma中創建超棒的效果，如Skeuomorph、霓虹燈、閃光、玻璃等--就在Figma中！一鍵變換，輕鬆調整屬性，混合匹配。一鍵轉換，輕鬆調整屬性，混合和匹配。發揮創意吧 可在 Figma 社區免費使用。
localize.tagline: 在Figma中直接創建超棒的效果
